About.title: About me
About.subtitle: Meet Antonewton, a skilled Front-end Developer.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Software Developer passionate about tech, startups, and personal projects
introduction.description: Antonewton Quima is a passionate software developer and computer engineering student at ISPTEC, as well as a student at 42 Luanda School, dedicated to building innovative solutions that make an impact. With expertise in frontend development, he specializes in Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and Shadcn, crafting modern and user-friendly web applications.
introduction.description2: Antonewton is committed to continuous learning, collaboration, and delivering high-quality digital experiences.

three.title: Version 3.0
three.description: A major update with a new design and improved performance. The portfolio now features a more modern look, faster loading times, and enhanced user experience. New projects and achievements have been added to showcase my latest work.
